Detailed Description

This class represents an action from a SuperModel perspective.

Member Function Documentation

float SuperModelAction::blendRatio (  )  const

Calculate the blend ratio for this action.

void SuperModelAction::tick ( SuperModel &  superModel,
float  dtime 
)

This method ticks the animations referenced by this action in the input supermodel.

It must be the same as it was created with. Only the top model's animations are ticked. This is a helper method, since ticks are discouraged in SuperModel code.

Reimplemented from Fashion.
